metadata.evidence: CLI implemented in internal/infrastructure/cli, MCP in internal/infrastructure/mcp
Verified via successful execution of roady commands and mcp server tests
Provider interface in domain, implementations for Ollama, OpenAI, and Mock in infrastructure
Successful execution of plan generate --ai with both Ollama and OpenAI
DriftService implemented with Plan vs Spec, Code vs State, and Policy checks
Verified via roady drift detect command catching intentional discrepancies
Task state machine using statekit and persistent state.json
Verified via successful task transitions across pending, in_progress, done, and verified
Integration of fortify/retry and fortify/timeout in ResilientProvider
Verified via successful handling of slow local models and simulated failures
SpecService implemented with import, analyze, and lock capabilities
Verified via successful multi-file spec inference and intent drift detection
PlanService implemented with generation, reconciliation, and AI-powered decomposition
Verified via successful generation of granular plans from specs using GPT-4o and Ollama
Implementation of roady status and roady timeline commands
Verified via high-resolution status summaries and reverse-chronological project activity views
Local-first, git-friendly storage in .roady/ with cryptographic audit trails
Verified via manual git commit of .roady artifacts and timeline consistency across actors
Usage tracking in usage.json and AI token governance in policy.yaml
Verified via successful enforcement of token limits and accurate usage reporting

Enhanced usage.go with budget alerts (75%, 90%, 100% thresholds); Enhanced release.sh with governance event logging (release.started through release.completed)

Created docs/mcp-guide.md with comprehensive MCP documentation (transports, tools, examples); Updated docs/ai-configuration.md with provider table and usage alerts; Updated README.md with MCP guide reference

Added JSON schema validation in parseTasksFromResponse using gojsonschema; Added GetAITelemetry() method to AuditService and EventSourcedAuditService for AI usage metrics (total calls, tokens by action/model, retry count); Added test coverage for AI telemetry

Added StatusArgs with filter params (status, priority, ready, blocked, active, limit, json) to MCP; Fixed WebSocket transport test using gorilla/websocket; Updated SDK examples with Forecast, Dependency, and Debt service demos; All tests pass
